name: assignment3
description: /*******************************************************  * 🗂️ Folder Map in Story Terms (LEGO Shop Analogy) 🧱  *  * Real Folder/File         Story Role                  What it Does  * -------------------------------------------------------------------------  * server.js                🧍 Manager at front desk    Greets visitors, talks to helper, shows pages  * modules/legoSets.js      🤖 Smart helper in back      Handles LEGO logic, uses data  * data/                    📦 Basement warehouse       Has all LEGO info (Lego set & theme data)  * views/                   🖼️ Shop display windows      Static HTML pages visitors see (home, about, 404)  * package.json             🧰 Toolbox manual                                                                                                                                                       Describes setup and tools used (dependencies, scripts)  *  * 🏪 This is your LEGO shop! Every part plays a role to  * keep the server clean, modular, and user-friendly.  *******************************************************/
